CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper June 12, 1954, pg. 7, reads: "AUBA Scholarship Recipients - Ministers Wives of the Allegheny-Union Baptist Association present scholarship organ recital. The Rev. H. R. Williams, secretary, presents checks to the following at Sixth Mount Zion Church, left to right: B. Morris, R. Beasley, A. Petett, D. Brothers, B. Hodge, D. Fleming, B. Sumlin, M. Jefferson, D. Ashford, R. Russell, S. Reynolds. Second row: B. Williams, M. Lance, B. Atkins, J. Stubbs, B. Pressley and L. Worthey. Not in the picture: B. Heard, M. Gaines, R. Glenn, S. Saunder and R. Amos. Mrs. W. D. Petett, president; Mrs. Sadie Morton, president of Women's Auxiliary; Dr. E. P. Tunie, moderator, and the Rev. J. C. Hairston, pastor. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Rev. H. R. Williams presenting checks to, from left: B. Morris, R. Beasley, A. Petett, D. Brothers, B. Hodge, D. Fleming, B. Sumlin, M. Jefferson, D. Ashford, R. Russell, S. Reynolds, second row: B. Williams, M. Lance, B. Atkins, J. Stubbs, B. Pressley and L. Worthey in Sixth Mount Zion Church
